main.name: Grace White
main.description: In search for a job in Front-end development. I have experience in design and social media platforms. I'm a dependable figure and have a keen eye for detail. I work best individually but also can work well with a team.
main.bio: I am a recent graduate from the University of Central Florida with a Bachelors of Art in Web Design.
main.contactmessage: If you are a employer looking for a hard working college grad who is ready to grow with your team. Contact me!

resume.skillmessage: Soon to be grad from The University of Central Florida.

education.degree: Masters in Digital Media - Web and Social Platforms
education.description: I spent my 4 years at UCF crafting my skills in design, UX/UI, Html, CSS, Javascript, React.js, and Social Media Platforms.
